<template>
  <v-app
    ><v-container class="ma-10">
      <v-col cols="12" class="pa-12">
        <v-card>
          <v-col cols="12" md="4" class="d-flex d-inline-flex">
            <v-col cols="6">
              <v-text-field
                v-model="usersname"
                label="ชื่อ"
                solo
              ></v-text-field>
            </v-col>
            <v-col cols="6"> </v-col></v-col
        ></v-card>
      </v-col>
    </v-container>
  </v-app>
</template>

<script>
export default {
  data() {
    return {
      usersname: "",
      show1: false,
      show2: true,
      show3: false,
      show4: false,
      password: "",
      rules: {
        required: (value) => !!value || "Required.",
        min: (v) => v.length >= 8 || "Min 8 characters",
        emailMatch: () => `The email and password you entered don't match`,
      },
    };
  },
};
</script>

<style></style>
